document.full_text: libya's foreign ministry declared a ceasefire in misrata on monday, the libyan news agency said, referring to the western town where rebels earlier said government forces gained control of part of the city.
document.title: libyan government announces ceasefire in misrata
lines_and_colors: libya's foreign ministry declared a ceasefire in misrata on monday, the libyan news agency said, referring to the western town where rebels earlier said government forces gained control of part of the city.
